message: Once we've lost him, Koujaku and I slow to a stop. I'm completely out of breath.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...We should be fine now."

name: 紅雀
message: "Yeah."
Koujaku turns around to double check, then flashes me an apologetic look.

name: 紅雀
message: "Sorry, man. First I made a mess at your place, now this. I just lost my cool... That little shithead."
Koujaku's expression turns more serious.

name: 紅雀
message: "He's the one who pulled you into that Rhyme match, isn't he?"
I gape. He hit the nail on the head.

name: 紅雀
message: "So you knew. I had a feeling."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Sorry."

name: 紅雀
message: "Nah, I'm not trying to give you shit for it. But that guy's been messing with you since then, right? What happened?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Well, um..."
There's no point hiding it anymore.

name: 蒼葉
message: "When he dragged me into that match, I was freaked out, you know? I'd never even played Rhyme before."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I guess I passed out or something, because I don't remember what happened... but he... he says I won."

name: 紅雀
message: "You won?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah, but I don't remember a thing. How could I have won, anyway? He insists I did, though."

name: 紅雀
message: "So, what, he's following you around for revenge? I guess pride's the only thing that little fucker has."

name: 紅雀
message: "Rhyme or not, a loss is a loss. A real man knows how to accept defeat."

name: 紅雀
message: "Plus, you blacked out, right? It sounds like he's just making up shit to harass you."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I guess..."

name: 紅雀
message: "What's wrong? Is something bothering you?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "So... while I was in that Rhyme match, I heard a voice."

name: 紅雀
message: "You mean besides his?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah. And I didn't hear it so much as it came from inside my head."

name: 蒼葉
message: "And then I, like, started to give orders to Ren. Like I just suddenly knew how to fight."

name: 紅雀
message: "But you've never done Rhyme before, right?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah. I don't know how I gave those commands. It's creepy, man..."

I grow more and more anxious as I recall what happened. By the end, I'm looking at my feet.
Koujaku gently claps me on the shoulder.

name: 紅雀
message: "Hey, don't overthink it. That's always been a bad habit of yours. You don't want Ren going, 'Aoba, your head is at risk of exploding,' do you?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah..."
Koujaku's Ren impression makes me smile a little.

name: 紅雀
message: "Getting dragged into Rhyme probably messed with your head. Just remember, you can always tell me if something happens."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah, thanks."

name: 紅雀
message: "It's the least I can do... for a taste of Ms. Tae's home cooking."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Oh, that's your real motive?"

name: 紅雀
message: "Haha."
Laughing with Koujaku has lightened my mood a little.
Yeah... Not that I'm an expert or anything, but I guess keeping your fears bottled up isn't good for you.
Sometimes, it's better just to tell someone what you're feeling.

name: 紅雀
message: "Oh yeah, want to go hit up the guys in Dry Juice?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Sure. I'm worried about Mizuki too... Ah!"

name: 紅雀
message: "What's wrong?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "I'm supposed to be at work! I was watching the store because Mr. Haga was out!"

name: 紅雀
message: "Hey! Aren't you gonna get in trouble?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "I'll go call him."
I frantically call Mr. Haga on my Coil.

name: 羽賀
message: "Hello, you've reached Hum-Drum Junk."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Mr. Haga?! I'm so sorry, I―!"

name: 羽賀
message: "Oh, Aoba. You weren't at the shop. I was wondering what happened to you. Was there some kind of emergency?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Well, I, uh..."
Telling him about Noiz won't help. I have no idea how to explain the situation, so I just bullshit my way through, apologizing profusely.
Mr. Haga seems a little perplexed, but he forgives me.

name: 羽賀
message: "Don't worry about it. I'm here now."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I'm so sorry about this! I'll be more careful next time!"

name: 羽賀
message: "I know you will. Well, stay safe."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Thank you, sir!"

name: 紅雀
message: "Everything okay?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "I guess..."
Mr. Haga may have let me off the hook, but I sure am a failure as an adult...
I'll have to make it up to him later.
After that, Koujaku and I head for Dry Juice's territory: the alleys in the east quarter off Yukisagi, peppered with abandoned restaurants and bars.
